pkgmetadata.longdescription: TLV (tag length lavue) data parser, especially useful for [EMV](http://emvco.com) tags parsingTo import the pytlv module in your code:```pythonfrom pytlv.TLV import *```To parse data from a TLV string:```pythontlv = TLV(['84', 'A5']) # provide the possible tag valuestlv.parse('840E315041592E5359532E4444463031A5088801025F2D02656E')>>> {'84': '315041592E5359532E4444463031', 'A5': '8801025F2D02656E'}```To build a TLV string:```pythontlv = TLV(['9F02', '9F04'])tlv.build({'9f02': '000000001337'})>>> '9F0206000000001337'```
